main.title: Speed Up and Simplify Inventory with E-Revision!

about.title: ABOUT THE APP
about.subtitle: E-Revision is a mobile app designed for efficient and quick inventory management in stores and warehouses. It is perfect for entrepreneurs of all scales. The app provides reliable control and management of product stock, allowing you to focus on growing your business.

howItWork.title: HOW IT WORKS
howItWork.step1: Select a store from the list of pre-registered stores for the inventory check
howItWork.step2: Upload a file with accounting stock data to compare with real data
howItWork.step3: Inventory products using your phone camera or manually input the barcode and local code
howItWork.step4: Enter the quantity of the scanned product
howItWork.step5: Search and filter scanned products for a quick assessment of current stock
howItWork.step6: Receive a file with the inventory results, ready for export to 1C for further data processing
